animeDescription: A music video for the song "Yumi-chan no Hikkoshi: Sayonara Tsutomu-kun" by Keiji Kawahashi (川橋啓史), and Kako Ootsuko (大塚佳子). Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.
animeStaff: [['Chiyo Masayuki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Minami Rambow', ['Theme Song Lyrics', 'Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Tanaka Keiko', ['Animation Director']]]
